projects.name: CutePigeons
projects.description: An application about pigeons. Powered by a Spring Boot backend that serves images stored on a postgres database with a Vue 3 frontend. All the authorization is made via auth0 the logging in the frontend and the validaiton in the backend.

projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description: The web page you're looking at at the moment! It's a simple static page made in Vue3 using Vuetify
